Find below several examples of projects students can complete to master the various topics covered in the ISK e-book.

## Example 1

In this example, each student receive a data set and a research question and have to write a research report.

### Learning Objectives

1. Identify variables from a research question statement
2. Formulate hypotheses from a research question statement
3. Identify the appropriate statistical procedure to test the formulated hypothesis
4. Conduct statistical analysis in `jamovi` (See Section \@ref(jamovi))
5. Interpret the results of the data analysis
6. Create tables and figures to illustrate the findings
7. Prepare a research report

[**Complete this project**](./projects/project1.html)
